name: Spring Shabobble: Easter Egg Hunt
description:
Spring Shabobble: Easter Egg Hunt Happy Easter, happy spring, jolly everything to everyone! Our little Easter Bunny Bibi lost her eggs! Can you help her find them? Featurezzz

This short game features 24 puzzle platforming levels in which you go on an authentic Easter egg hunt! A perfect experience to celebrate the spring. You can also look for hidden puzzle pieces and try to improve your scores!

WASD to move, P for pause, SPACE to jump
